Welcome Investors

Invest with us and your money will be added to the Free Markets Insights Fund.
You will be able to monitor the fund on our homepage and view your balance on your profile.
There are currently no fees.
You can retrive your funds at any time via mailed check, direct deposit, or paypal.
We use paypal to ensure a secure transaction
